00024 #pragma once
00025 
00026 #include <thrust/detail/config.h>
00027 #include <thrust/iterator/iterator_facade.h>
00028 
00029 namespace thrust
00030 {
00031 
00032 namespace experimental
00033 {
00034 
00035 template<typename Derived,
00036          typename Base,
00037          typename Value,
00038          typename CategoryOrTraversal,
00039          typename Reference,
00040          typename Pointer,
00041          typename Difference>
00042   class iterator_adaptor:
00043     public iterator_facade<Derived, Value, CategoryOrTraversal, Reference, Pointer, Difference>
00044 {
00045     friend class iterator_core_access;
00046   
00047   public:
00048     __host__ __device__
00049     iterator_adaptor(){}
00050 
00051     __host__ __device__
00052     explicit iterator_adaptor(Base const& iter)
00053       : m_iterator(iter)
00054     {}
00055 
00056     typedef Base       base_type;
00057     typedef Reference  reference;
00058     typedef Difference difference_type;
00059 
00060     __host__ __device__
00061     Base const& base() const
00062     { return m_iterator; }
00063 
00064   protected:
00065     typedef iterator_adaptor iterator_adaptor_;
00066 
00067     __host__ __device__
00068     Base const& base_reference() const
00069     { return m_iterator; }
00070 
00071     __host__ __device__
00072     Base& base_reference()
00073     { return m_iterator; }
00074 
00075   private: // Core iterator interface for iterator_facade
00076 
00077     __host__ __device__
00078     typename iterator_adaptor::reference dereference() const
00079     { return *m_iterator; }
00080 
00081     template<typename OtherDerived, typename OtherIterator, typename V, typename C, typename R, typename P, typename D>
00082     __host__ __device__
00083     bool equal(iterator_adaptor<OtherDerived, OtherIterator, V, C, R, P, D> const& x) const
00084     { return m_iterator == x.base(); }
00085 
00086     __host__ __device__
00087     void advance(typename iterator_adaptor::difference_type n)
00088     {
00089       // XXX statically assert on random_access_traversal_tag
00090       m_iterator += n;
00091     }
00092 
00093     __host__ __device__
00094     void increment()
00095     { ++m_iterator; }
00096 
00097     __host__ __device__
00098     void decrement()
00099     {
00100       // XXX statically assert on bidirectional_traversal_tag
00101       --m_iterator;
00102     }
00103 
00104     template<typename OtherDerived, typename OtherIterator, typename V, typename C, typename R, typename P, typename D>
00105     __host__ __device__
00106     typename iterator_adaptor::difference_type distance_to(iterator_adaptor<OtherDerived, OtherIterator, V, C, R, P, D> const& y) const
00107     { return y.base() - m_iterator; }
00108 
00109   private:
00110     Base m_iterator; // exposition only
00111 }; // end iterator_adaptor
00112 
00113 } // end experimental
00114 
00115 } // end thrust
